concept.title: Elastic Load Balancing
concept.shortdesc: This topic explains suggestions for problems you might have with Elastic Load Balancing (ELB).

dlentry.dd: Eucalyptus sets up NTP automatically for any instance that has an internet connection to a public network. If an instance doesn't have such a connection, set the cloud property loadbalancing.loadbalancer_vm_ntp_server to a valid NTP server IP address.

dlentry.dt: Need to debug an ELB instance
dlentry.dd: To debug an ELB instance, set the loadbalancing.loadbalancer_vm_keyname cloud property to the keypair of the instance you want to debug.
